templates.title: Immich Kiosk
templates.name: immich-kiosk
templates.description: Immich Kiosk is a lightweight slideshow for running on kiosk devices and browsers that uses Immich as a data source.

env.name: LANG
env.label: LANG
env.description: Sets the language and timezone for the container

env.name: TZ
env.label: TZ
env.description: Sets the language and timezone for the container

env.name: KIOSK_IMMICH_API_KEY
env.label: KIOSK_IMMICH_API_KEY
env.description: Sets the Immich API key for the container

env.name: KIOSK_IMMICH_URL
env.label: KIOSK_IMMICH_URL
env.description: Sets the Immich server URL for the container

env.name: KIOSK_IMMICH_EXTERNAL_URL
env.label: KIOSK_IMMICH_EXTERNAL_URL
env.description: Sets the Immich external URL for the container
